response.message: Cue reCaptcha's servers getting hammered by people on a refresh cycle trying to find a funny one...
I got my name as one of the words one time. It was kinda freaky.

Whilst funny I had my hopes up that you had resolved the issues with getting the CAPTCHA when I'm retagging the five posts with the incorrect tag.

CAPTCHA: Shiva vitozzi (wtf??)
I got one that said "Cluckin Hyman" once.

Err, a fairly old one (during the beta)

http://img55.imageshack.us/img55/9175/iamrobotxj8.png

(although I've since learned you only have to enter one word correctly, generally the less blurry one without any symbols/numbers/etc)

I think I must have beaten the reCaptcha into submission, because it just gave in to me:

http://i37.photobucket.com/albums/e77/kpeaton/captcha_small.jpg
Just happy that they're actually readable by this human, unlike some I've come across: http://www.geekrant.org/2009/03/22/captcha-fail/

Character map didn't help.

http://sine.cluenet.org/~grawity/trash/mad-recaptcha.jpg

-

This one's fresh:

http://sine.cluenet.org/~grawity/trash/mad-recaptcha-2.jpg
Google AdSense can be pretty funny sometimes too.

I think this should get some points:

http://kirtangor.googlepages.com/1-million-dollar-cyclones.jpg

this is the best one i got.

http://i22.photobucket.com/albums/b335/xj22x/captcha.gif

i wonder what it tastes like? :)
I while ago I got Kinsey Test (http://imgur.com/nxbKA) and I though, "Phwoar!"
